plot: Bill Ohrmann used to own an Angus cattle ranch in Montana. Now, at 90 years old, he paints and makes artwork. This is a short glimpse into the man's work and mind.
title: Bill the Painter
plot_es: Bill Ohrmann used to own an Angus cattle ranch in Montana. Now, at 90 years old, he paints and makes artwork. This is a short glimpse into the man's work and mind.
plot_en: Bill Ohrmann used to own an Angus cattle ranch in Montana. Now, at 90 years old, he paints and makes artwork. This is a short glimpse into the man's work and mind.
